greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence combining gcd(n,sigma(n)) and gcd(n,phi(n)), (A009194 and A009195).
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of P(A009194(n), A009195(n)), where P(a,b) is a two-argument form of A000027 used as a Cantor pairing function N x N -> N.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 02 2018
